648870.name: Intel 5G VR Experience
648870.description:
EXPERIENCE THE EXCITEMENT & PROMISE OF THE 5G ERA

5G is almost upon us. Billions of things will interconnect. Cities, homes and workplaces will transform. Visit the future! Guided by ANA, your effervescent hostess, feel the impact of the next generation of networks. Learn how you can overcome the limitations of fixed-function networks and achieve 5G-readiness.
648870.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
